name: GetDocumentResult

fields.name: document
fields.documentation: The document that was retrieved, or {@code null} if no matching document was found.

fields.name: requestId
fields.documentation: The ID of the request that triggered this result. Used to correlate the response with the original request.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.documentation: The system time (in milliseconds since epoch) at which this result was generated.

methods.name: toMetric
methods.documentation:
Converts this result to a compact representation for metrics logging.

 @return a {@link Metric} containing only the response timestamp.
